summary: A film version of the famous Bizet opera, where a soldier (Don Jose) falls in love with a beautiful factory worker (Carmen), but she does not reciprocate his feelings.
cast: Julia Migenes|Plácido Domingo|Ruggero Raimondi|Faith Esham|François Le Roux|John-Paul Bogart|Susan Daniel|Lillian Watson|Jean-Philippe Lafont|Gérard Garino|Julien Guiomar|Accursio Di Leo|Maria Campano|Cristina Hoyos|Juan Antonio Jiménez|Aurora Vargas|Carmen Vargas|Concha Vargas|Esperanza Fernández|Lourdes García|María Gómez|Pilar Becerra|Compañía Antonio Gades
keywords: opera|based on opera|filmed opera|19th century|sevilla spain
title: Carmen de Bizet
